    History

    • 1994: University of Bath Static pages, with some JavaScript and Java Applet pointlessness
    • 1999: PHP 4 + MySQL (Shared server)
    • 2004: worldofnic.org domain registered & used
    • 2007-2012: CentOS , Ubuntu , Windows Server ) VMs.
    • 2007: Java + Spring MVC + PostgreSQL
    • 2008: Grails + PostgreSQL
      AWS S3 then AWS Cloudfront CDN
    • 2009: ASP.NET MVC + Castle Windsor + SQL Server
    • 2011: Wordpress + MariaDB (end of custom code).
    • 2012: OpenShift Online
      AWS Cloudfront also Fastly caching
    • 2013: Nesta
    • 2015: HSTS
      Caching removed.
      Azure CDN
      Bootstrap theme.
    • 2016: Jekyll

    Powered by Kubernetes on GKE using Jekyll and Bootstrap

    world of nic by Nicolas Doye is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License
